text:
The Kardashian women are willing to do just about anything to look and feel their best, this we know. Take the time Kim Kardashian West deleted all of her family holiday photos from her Instagram because they didn't fit her aesthetic. Or the family's dedication to body art. And let's not forget that Kylie Jenner once got a haircut with kitchen scissors.

But on this Sunday's episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, Kim and Kourtney Kardashian take things to a new level. In a bid to see who is healthier, Kim, Kourtney, and their best bud Jonathan Cheban take part in a health exam known as a "sweat test." The name is exactly what it implies: The threesome must somehow collect vials of their own sweat to then send off to a lab, which will test for any deficiencies or heavy metals.

“I’ve never heard of a sweat test, and it just sounds gross, but we do some pretty crazy things to get the information we need, especially when it comes to beauty and health," Kourtney said to the camera about her sister's health challenge. "I am definitely willing to do Kim’s test to prove that I’m healthier.”

To complete this mission, the three put on fluffy white robes and step inside Kim's home sauna (because of course Kim has a home sauna). There, they immediately begin to pour out sweat, and Jonathan announces, "I feel like a pig." He collects his share of sweat in record time. “I think this is good enough," he said. "It looks like cloudy sweat.” Gross.

Once the trio exit the sauna they lounge about, while Kim exclaims that she's "exhausted" from the practice. Kourtney kindly points out to the group that the test and its results are likely total and utter nonsense. Why? Because they are covered in makeup that would alter any findings. “I”ll ask my doctor, but I don’t want to take false results from sweat mixed with makeup and spray tan," she explained.

But hey, at least Kourtney said she learned one thing from the entire ordeal. As she noted, "I think I definitely need to start drinking more water." Watch the entire preview clip, below.

title: Kourtney and Kim Kardashian Compete in a 'Sweat Test' Just to See Who's Healthier

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: Kim Kardashian and Kourtney Kardashian hit the sauna to compete in a 'sweat test' on 'Keeping Up With the Kardashians.'
